title: Arithmetic Operations Challenge
description: Write a program that takes three numbers as input and performs the following operations: calculates the sum, difference, product, and quotient of the first two numbers, and then calculates the sum, difference, product, and quotient of the result and the third number. The program should output the results of all these operations in a clear and readable format.
sample_output:
Sum of 10 and 5: 15
Difference of 10 and 5: 5
Product of 10 and 5: 50
Quotient of 10 and 5: 2.0
Sum of 15 and 2: 17
Difference of 15 and 2: 13
Product of 15 and 2: 30
Quotient of 15 and 2: 7.5
